mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.writer_id, b.category_id, b.title, b.status, b.current_sequence, b.max_sequence, b.created_at FROM books b WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId}

SELECT b.book_id, b.writer_id, u.user_nicknm AS writerNicknm, b.category_id, b.title, b.status, b.current_sequence, b.max_sequence, b.created_at FROM books b LEFT JOIN users u ON b.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId}

SELECT s.sentence_id, s.sequence_no, s.content, s.writer_id, u.user_nicknm AS writerNicknm, s.created_at, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sentence_votes sv WHERE sv.sentence_id = s.sentence_id AND sv.vote_type = 'LIKE') AS likeCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sentence_votes sv WHERE sv.sentence_id = s.sentence_id AND sv.vote_type = 'DISLIKE') AS dislikeCount FROM sentences s LEFT JOIN users u ON s.writer_id = u.user_id WHERE s.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY s.sequence_no ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_votes WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND vote_type = 'LIKE'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_votes WHERE book_id = #{bookId} AND vote_type = 'DISLIKE'
SELECT b.book_id, b.writer_id, b.category_id, b.title, b.status, b.current_sequence, b.max_sequence, b.created_at FROM books b ORDER BY b.created_at DESC
